# 六爻真传

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/liuyao-zhenzhuan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/liuyao-zhenzhuan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install liuyao-zhenzhuan
liuyao-zhenzhuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g liuyao-zhenzhuan
liuyao-zhenzhuan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
